name: Swordsman
description: These little chaps don't ask for much. Put a sword in their hands, and tell them who to hit. The more they are, the merrier, so make sure you have plenty.

name: Archer
description: Deadly with a bow and arrow. Can shoot a duck from the sky, a deer behind a bush, and occasionaly a foe on the castle walls. Careful though, if charged by something mean and ugly, will run the other way.

name: Knight
description: Wears plated armor and carries around four feet of razor-sharp steel. A knight without a horse is still a knight, but a knight with a horse is definitely a faster knight.
